translations: （古希腊和古罗马）有三列桨座的战船

sentences.sentence: The addition of the trireme definitely increases your options in terms of ancient - era naval combat.
sentences.translation: 三层浆战船的增加给你在远古时期的海战提供了新的选择。

sentences.sentence: The Athenian trireme was about 120 ft (37 m) long, and was rowed by 170 oarsmen seated in three tiers along each side;
sentences.translation: 雅典人的三层划桨战船长约37公尺，由170名桨手在三层高的船两边划动，速度可达到7海浬；
